name: mcp-skills-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins generated from MCP servers using mcp2rest. Each plugin provides agents and skills for interacting with MCP tools.

plugins.name: chrome-devtools-plugin
plugins.description: Browser automation via Chrome DevTools Protocol. Control Chrome programmatically, interact with pages, debug applications, and analyze performance using mcp2rest.

plugins.name: figma-desktop-plugin
plugins.description: Design-to-code automation via Figma Desktop. Extract UI code, design tokens, and screenshots from Figma files using mcp2rest integration.
